items.sentence: I\'m getting sick and tired of all your complaints.
Tom is very methodical in the way he does his work.
Tom is, without question, the best man for the job.
Our dorm\'s heating system isn\'t working properly.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t want to work with you.
Tom told me that he won\'t come to school tomorrow.
If you don\'t leave, I\'m going to call the police.
Tom and his brother usually cut each other\'s hair.
Tom doesn\'t like the way his mother cuts his hair.
You didn\'t seem to understand what Tom was saying.
